Text: Final Symphony II:  The concert tour features arrangements of video game music selected from the "Final Fantasy" series, specifically "Final Fantasy V", "VIII", "IX", and "XIII".

4:
--------------------
Text: Final Symphony II:  The concert is produced and directed by Thomas Böcker of Merregnon Studios, with arrangements provided by Finnish composer and musician Jonne Valtonen, along with Roger Wanamo and "Final Fantasy XIII" composer Masashi Hamauzu.
